import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Movie(props) { const movies = useSelector(store => store.movieReducers.movies) const movie = movies[props.sira] return (

{movie.title}

{movie.genres.join(', ')}

{movie.plot}

YÃ¶netmen {movie.director}
Oyuncular {movie.actors}
{movie.year} {movie.runtime}dk
) };
